Accessibility Toolkit Pro

This is a comprehensive single-file HTML accessibility toolbar with 12 WCAG-inspired features. Test all keyboard navigation (Tab/Enter/Space), drag toolbar, persistence, shortcuts (Alt+1-9, Alt+0, Esc), and mobile responsiveness.

Features Demo

Link 1 to Link 2. Click or select this text for TTS testing.

Paragraph 1 with multiple sentences for reading guide and TTS. Scroll to see reading guide animation. This toolbar persists settings and position via localStorage.

Paragraph 2. Test high contrast, big text (2x), readable fonts, color inversion, grayscale, link underlines/glow, image hiding, cursor enlargement, and dark mode.

Undo/Redo with Ctrl+Z/Y reverts last 5 actions. Drag toolbar to reposition (persists). Fully ARIA compliant with live announcements.
